name: The Chosen Warriors
description: The Chosen Warriors is a new old school side scroller beat 'em up inspired by games like Golden Axe and Knights of the Round.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core 3.0ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 9600GT Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Ati Radeon HD 6670 Storage: 4 GB available space
